name: Out of State
description: The Out of State pairs tequila with carrot purée, sweetened by agave syrup that has been infused with kaffir lime leaf.
keywords: carrot juice, kaffir lime leaf syrup, tequila
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce carrot purée or carrot juice

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously. (Drinks with egg whites require longer and harder shaking for the egg to emulsify.) Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and garnish with the lime zest and lime slice.
